wikipedia_page.main: Richard John Parkhouse (2 March 1910 – 1 January 1984) was a cricketer. A right-handed batsman, he played internationals for Egypt and Nigeria and first-class cricket for Glamorgan.

response: * Richard Parkhouse – played for Glamorgan in 1939.Richard Parkhouse at CricketArchive
